channel.title: Maximum Karma in SMF
channel.description:
Before anyone says anything.. I checked simplemachines.org and I did Google this problem...
Anyways. I want to limit the amount of karma a user can have, not the amount they can give. Like on here the limit is 200, I would like mine to be 100, as a user can only give 1 karma at a time.
EDIT: SMF 1.1.11
Any help would be appreciated.
Thanks, Ryan

item.title: Maximum Karma in SMF
item.dc:creator: @iCreatedHorror Ryan
item.description:
@iCreatedHorror wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:2, topic:358813”]Use moparisthebest’s Karma file: http://www.moparisthebest.com/downloads/Karma.phps
It is set to limit reputation to 200 but you can easily modify it to 100.
You simply save it as Karma.php and replace your current Karma.php file.[/quote]
I’ve already tried that, as that was the only thing I found on simplemachines. But it messed up my Karma Description, and users could get over 200.
